item.title: DP.A1 - Requirements elicitation.
item.description: The objective of this activity is to acquire the set of requirements specifications for multiple stakeholders or to define the requirements by considering marketability. These requirements should be ordered and prioritized in order to facilitate the assignment to the sprints. The following actions should be carried out: 1.- Collect requirements for the customer, 2.- Analyse and define the technical requirements and finally 3.- Prioritize the requirements .

item.title: DP.A2 - Select the requirements to be developed in the sprint
item.description: In this activity, the team selects those requirements to be completed during each sprint. These requirements should be selected from the list of prioritized requirements and those requirements from the previous sprint. Besides selecting the requirements, it is important to agree on the time and deadline to be implemented.

item.title: DP.A3 - Analysis and modelling
item.description: The objective of this activity is to analyse the requirements assigned to each sprint and model them in order to facilitate the development.

item.title: DP.A4 - Development
item.description: During this activity the prototype of each spring will be developed according to the design done in activity DP.A3

item.title: DP.A5 - Testing of functional and non-functional requirements
item.description: The objective of this activity is to test if the prototype covers all the requirements assigned to each sprint functional and non-functional.
